alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Gilchrist; Trout River; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 2:37AM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and northern Florida. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
